last_episode_to_air.name: Frock4Life
last_episode_to_air.overview: RuPaul's Drag Race queens and fans from all over the world gather at DragFest UK to watch the Frock Destroyers perform their album Frock4Life for the first time since the pandemic. They Frocking smashed it!

name: Frock Destroyers: Frockumentary
overview: This four-part series follows the lives of RuPaul’s Drag Race UK season 1 queens, Baga Chipz, Divina DeCampo, and Blu Hydrangea aka the Frock Destroyers as they record, release, and perform their debut album, Frock4Life, during a global pandemic.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: This four-part series follows the lives of RuPaul’s Drag Race UK season 1 queens, Baga Chipz, Divina DeCampo, and Blu Hydrangea aka the Frock Destroyers as they record, release, and perform their debut album, Frock4Life, during a global pandemic.

episodes.name: Taking Over the World
episodes.overview: As the first band to come out of a girl group's challenge on RuPaul's Drag Race, the Frock Destroyers are excited when World of Wonder offers them a record contract. With Leland as their Executive Producer, the Frock Destroyers set out to write and record an album.

episodes.name: That's Some Popstar Shit
episodes.overview: Leland and The Frock Destroyers record the Frock4life album remotely, while Leland is in Los Angeles and the Frock Destroyers are in London. World of Wonder's marketing team prepares for its release.

episodes.name: Put a Crown On It
episodes.overview: The Frock Destroyers return to the RuPaul's Drag Race UK set to film their first ever music video, "Her Majesty" directed by Tony Grech-Smith.

episodes.name: Frock4Life
episodes.overview: RuPaul's Drag Race queens and fans from all over the world gather at DragFest UK to watch the Frock Destroyers perform their album Frock4Life for the first time since the pandemic. They Frocking smashed it!
